mapper.select: select users.id,users.name,users.pwd,users.email,users.sign,users.level,(select count(*) from follows where uid=#{id}) as following,(select count(*) from follows where tid=#{id}) as followers,(select count(*) from posts where uid=#{id}) as postcount from users where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into users (name, email, pwd, sign, level) values (#{name}, #{email}, #{pwd}, #{sign}, #{level})
mapper.update: update users set name=#{name}, email=#{email}, pwd=#{pwd}, sign=#{sign}, level=#{level} where id = #{id}
